bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to N.W. Pyle, May 4, 1942

div1.p: Hench thanks Pyle for sending him still photographs from the film “Yellow Jack.”

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to N.W. Pyle, May 4, 1942
div1.opener:
May 4, 1942
Mr. N. W. Pyle
1104 Currie Avenue
Minneapolis, Minnesota
My dear Mr. Pyle:
div1.p:
I appreciate greatly your sending to me through
the office of Mr. Ray Niles, the stills from the film
“Yellow Jack”. When I use these I shall abide by your
admonition regarding the credit line.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. Copy to Mr. Ray Niles
and associates
